## taylor <a href='https://taylor.wjakethompson.com'><img src='featured-hex.png' align="right" width="120" alt='Hex logo for the taylor package.'/></a>

taylor is an *R* package developed to be a comprehensive resource for data on Taylor Swift songs.
Data is included for  all officially released studio albums, extended plays (EPs), and individual singles.
The data includes lyrics from [Genius](https://genius.com/artists/Taylor-swift) and audio characteristics from [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/06HL4z0CvFAxyc27GXpf02) for each song.
Additional functions are included for easily creating data visualizations with color palettes inspired by Taylor Swift's album covers.
